definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Alcohol consumption is linked to both higher homicide rates and more vehicle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 酒精消耗和杀人案件及交通事故增多都有联系。

sentences.english: The number of explosions and arbitrary killings has declined in recent weeks.
sentences.chinese: 最近几周以来，爆炸案和任意杀人案件正在逐步减少。

sentences.english: Interlink homicides happen in the quite highway, you are the murderer.
sentences.chinese: 寂静的公路发生了连环杀人案件，凶手就是你。

sentences.english: I didn't hear about the recent case of murder.
sentences.chinese: 我没有听说最近的杀人案件。

sentences.english: Anti-detection acts are representative in the series of robbery and murder cases.
sentences.chinese: 系列谋财杀人案件中的反侦查行为很具有代表性。

sentences.english: An investigation into the killings is under way, Xinhua said.
sentences.chinese: 新华社说，这个杀人案件正在进行调查。

definition: murder as a crime of passion
to commit a crime or offence
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
